name: Shrimp Fettuccine Alfredo
author: MAMATIFF
summary: This is a very simple recipe and it tastes divine! My sister and I were trying to come up with the perfect Alfredo recipe and we found it.
ingredients: 1 pound cooked shrimp - peeled and deveined
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain
In a large skillet, cook and stir shrimp and garlic in the butter for about one minute
Pour in half and half; stir
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese in one tablespoon at a time, stirring constantly
After all Parmesan is added, mix in parsley and salt
Stir frequently making sure it does not boil
Sauce will take a while to thicken
When sauce has thickened, combine with cooked pasta noodles; serve hot
